biography: Kristian, a familiar face from Master Golf Club, has graced the fairways of the Hector Trophée on three occasions, bringing his distinctive blend of competitive spirit and affable charm to the esteemed tournament. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the individual Victor Trophy have remained elusive for Kristian, his presence is always warmly anticipated by fellow competitors and spectators alike.
Known for his meticulous approach to the game, Kristian is admired for his sportsmanship. Despite not participating in Hector Trophée 2025, Kristian remains an active member of the Hector community.
